verses.roman:
sarvajña mahāprabhu niṣedhilā more
prabhura caraṇa dhari' kahena tāṅhāre

synonyms: sarva-jña—who knows everything; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; niṣedhilā—has forbidden; more—me; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇa—the feet; dhari'-touching; kahena tāṅhāre—began to speak to Him.
translation: Sanātana Gosvāmī concIuded, "Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who knows everything-past, present and future-has forbidden me to commit suicide." He then fell down, touching the lotus feet of the Lord, and spoke to Him as follows.
